Plot: A mysterious Hollywood stuntman and mechanic moonlights as a getaway driver and finds himself trouble when he helps out his neighbor.
Title: Drive
Actors: Ryan Gosling, Carey Mulligan, Bryan Cranston, Albert Brooks
tomatoConsensus: With its hyper-stylized blend of violence, music, and striking imagery, Drive represents a fully realized vision of arthouse action.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 71 wins & 157 nominations.
